verses.name: Matthew 20:6
verses.text: And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?

verses.name: Matthew 20:7
verses.text: They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right, that shall ye receive.

verses.name: Matthew 20:8
verses.text: So when even was come, the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward, Call the labourers, and give them their hire, beginning from the last unto the first.

verses.name: Matthew 20:9
verses.text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour, they received every man a penny.
